item.title: WhatsApp now allows businesses to send authentication codes to users in India

item.description:

item.title: Defense AI startup Helsing raises $487M Series C, plans Baltic expansion to combat Russian threat
item.dc:creator: Mike Butcher
item.description:
Helsing has created a new entity in Estonia and plans to spend €70 million on Baltic defense projects over the next three years.

item.title: Alma co-founder had such a bad immigration experience she founded a legal AI startup to fix it

item.description:

item.title: WhatsApp Business is changing its rates for messages as it aims to reduce marketing spam
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
WhatsApp Business is changing its per-conversation rates for businesses — a conversation is a 24-hour thread between sellers and users. The company is reducing rates for utility messages and raising rates for marketing messages. Meta charges businesses through four categories of messages: marketing (offers, new products), utility (order updates, account balance), authentication (one-time passwords) and […]

item.title: Watch a robot navigate the Google DeepMind offices using Gemini
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
DeepMind has implemented Google Gemini 1.5 Pro to teach a robot to respond to commands and navigate around an office.

item.title: HerculesAI has been working with large languge models long before it was cool
item.dc:creator: Ron Miller
item.description:
HerculesAI (formerly Zero Systems) has been working at automating professional services since 2017, originally concentrating on the legal industry. As part of that, it has actually been building large language models for several years, long before the idea entered the public consciousness. As such, it found itself in the right place at the right time […]

item.title: Formlabs acquires 3D printing startup Micronics mid-Kickstarter campaign

item.title: Medal raises $13M as it builds out a contextual AI assistant for desktop
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Medal, a startup that is better known for its video game clipping product, just announced that it has raised $13 million at a valuation of $333 million from several investors, including Horizons Ventures, OMERS Ventures, peak6 and Arcadia Investment Partners. The company also unveiled Highlight, a new cross-platform desktop app that acts as a contextual […]

item.title: Alpine Space Ventures close first fund to grow the space economy on both sides of the pond
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description:
When early SpaceX engineer Bulent Altan and long-time investor Joran Voelklein surveyed the European space sector at the end of the 2010s, they were surprised: it looked a whole lot like the beginnings of American NewSpace in the early 2000s, when SpaceX and other companies were just setting up shop.  The pair decided to go […]

item.title: Intel Capital backs AI construction startup that could boost Intel’s own manufacturing prospects
item.dc:creator: Paul Sawers
item.description:
Intel could be giving its burgeoning foundry ambitions a much-needed shot in the arm, as the chip giant’s venture capital arm today revealed that it’s making a “strategic” investment in an Israel- and U.K.-based AI construction startup. Intel Capital is leading a $15 million investment into Buildots, a company that uses AI and computer vision […]

item.title: AI-powered Regard nabs $61M to find missed illness, boost hospital revenue
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description:
People in tech often say that data is the new oil. That phrase, coined by British mathematician Clive Humby, of course implies that data is valuable. Data about a person’s health can also provide meaningful insights and improve outcomes, but only 3% of patient data is currently used by physicians, according to the World Economic […]

item.title: EU ends Apple Pay antitrust probe with binding commitments to open up contactless payments
item.dc:creator: Natasha Lomas
item.description:
The European Union has accepted commitments from Apple over how it operates Apple Pay to settle a long running competition investigation. Commission EVP Margrethe Vestager, who heads up the EU’s competition division, announced the development in a press conference Thursday. Apple has until July 25 to implement changes that will allow developers of rival mobile […]

item.title: Joby Aviation is betting on hydrogen-electric aircraft for regional flight
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description:
Joby Aviation is still a year away from commercially launching its electric air taxi designed for urban environments, but the startup is already looking towards its next chapter: Intercity flight, powered by hydrogen.  To get the conversation started with regulators and demonstrate hydrogen’s capabilities, Joby told TechCrunch that it completed a 523-mile test flight with […]

item.title: Sekai secures Naruto’s license to develop consumer apps for anime fans
item.dc:creator: Romain Dillet
item.description:
Just like in your favorite anime, this is the story of a young group of twentysomethings who started with nothing, traveled the world and ended up with a global license to develop official Naruto consumer apps. Founded in early 2022, French startup Sekai describes itself as a studio that wants to create entertainment experiences with […]

item.title: Uzbekistan mobile bank TBC raises $38.2M to expand its financial products

Uzbekistan's mobile-only bank TBC Bank Uzbekistan has raised $38.2 million in a fresh funding by its existing shareholders.

item.title: Adfin wants to fix bill payments for sole traders and small companies
item.dc:creator: Romain Dillet
item.description:
Meet Adfin, a new UK-based fintech startup that wants to help companies get their invoices paid — whatever it takes. Founded by two fintech experts, the company is starting with a problem and building a product around it. The problem is that it’s still hard to get paid if you’re set up as a sole […]

item.title: Reliance may list Jio at $112 billion valuation next year, Jefferies says
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Reliance Industries, India’s most valuable company, may consider spinning off its telecom arm Jio for a public listing as early as 2025, Jefferies said in a research note, with investors favoring this route over an initial public offering. The move follows Jio’s recent focus on monetization and market share gains, signaled by its leading role […]

item.title: Apple warns iPhone users in 98 countries of spyware attacks
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Apple has issued a new round of threat notifications to iPhone users across 98 countries, warning them of potential mercenary spyware attacks. It’s the second such alert campaign from the company this year, following a similar notification sent to users in 92 nations in April. Since 2021, Apple has been regularly sending these notifications, reaching […]

item.title: Beeble AI raises $4.75M to launch a virtual production platform for indie filmmakers
item.dc:creator: Kate Park
item.description:
Visual effects (VFX) have emerged as essential in filmmaking and have transformed storytelling and creativity in the film industry with its diverse digital techniques. However, the high cost of VFX tools often leaves independent filmmakers and content creators working with modest budgets struggling to compete with larger productions. A new company, Beeble AI, is turning […]
